## FluentTheme.toFluent property

Returns a Fluent-compatible theme object, suitable to apply to the ThemeProvider component See https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/fluentui\#/controls/web/themes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toFluent: () => IFluentTheme;
```
